channel.title: [REQUEST] Godswords [REQUEST]
channel.description: Ok there are a couple of things I need to know 1. How to make correct stance for godswords 2. How to add specs in general 3. Emote ID's for godswords 4. Make an equip level for godswords Please help.

item.title: [REQUEST] Godswords [REQUEST]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

Alright but how would I do this stuff for devolution
PS: Isn’t the cache and graphics the clients job?

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Godswords [REQUEST]
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“hippie408, post:4, topic:235291”]Its a type of server.

317 is like servers for mopar or silab client…503s and 508s are newest, and they have pretty much all emotes, most graphics, all items and NPCs…[/quote]
No, it’s a type of server that uses a certain cache. In this case it uses the standard cache 317. 377 Clients have stuff like updated Ahrims robes, that’s because it has a 377 cache. 508 Servers are just remade to fit the 508 cache i think.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Godswords [REQUEST]
item.dc:creator: @hippie408 hippie408
item.description:
@hippie408 wrote:

Well I’ll tell you now if your using a 317…

Godswords have never gotten anything right on 317s

No correct Specs, but close
No correct stance…
Wrong attack style…

For level though…

look up in client.java

getCLattack

Then just copy one of them…and change ID

then the

return ##

Change ## to the attack level you need.

Read full topic
